Detailed Description

A class for outputting Connector.

This class simplifies the insertion of a Connector into a stream while letting the user control how the Connector is formatted for output.

Each Outputter is a light-weight object constructed with a Connector and output parameters. The Outputter is capable of outputting its Connector, formatted according to the parameters.

To use,

See also:
Connector::format(), Connector::formatStatistics().
